title: 'It's sick' - Woman (80) has pension stolen after thieves stalk her from Post Office
text: 'It's sick' - Woman (80) has pension stolen after thieves stalk her from Post Office Independent.ie Gardai are hunting a pair of thieves who followed an elderly woman from a Post Office and stole her pension. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/news/its-sick-woman-80-has-pension-stolen-after-thieves-stalk-her-from-post-office-35462194.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35462164.ece/3c483/AUTOCROP/h342/pjimage%2027.jpg Gardai are hunting a pair of thieves who followed an elderly woman from a Post Office and stole her pension.
